category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 16 (Performance Improvement Committee)
contents: Article 16 (Performance Improvement Committee) The Performance Improvement Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2023. 7. 5. 1. Basic plan to improve national team performance 2. Establishment of enhanced training plan for the Olympic Games and Asian Games 3. Matters related to research support and field application of sports science 4. Training and quality improvement of sports coaches Matters pertaining to 5. Matters pertaining to the selection of executives and players participating in national team training 6. Matters pertaining to the guidance, supervision, evaluation and analysis of national team training 7. Matters pertaining to the discovery and nurturing of individuals with excellent talents 8. Matters pertaining to officials and players participating in national team training 9. Matters related to commendation recommendations and disciplinary action awards 9. Matters related to selection recommendations and post-evaluation of athletes dispatched to the Olympic Games and Asian Games 10. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Performance Improvement Committee and submitted by the president [Article 15] Moved from , the previous Article 16 was moved to Article 17 [April 3, 2017]
